manipulations.insert_object: Add a large chandelier hanging from the ceiling, reflecting light realistically.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the pillar in the left of the scene to create more space, blending the background seamlessly.
manipulations.replace_background: Change the background visible through the doorway to a view of a snowy mountain range.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add a heavy snowfall visible through the doorway in the background, with flakes landing on surfaces.
manipulations.duplication_scale: Duplicate the red lantern, shrinking it to half the size, and hang it next to the original.
